1→ 2→'use client' 3→import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' 4→import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card' 5→import { Button } from './ui/button' 6→import { Input } from './ui/input' 7→import { formatDate, generateId } from '@/lib/utils' 8→ 9→interface Task { 10→ id: string 11→ title: string 12→ description: string 13→ completed: boolean 14→ priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' 15→ createdAt: Date 16→ dueDate?: Date 17→} 18→ 19→export function TaskManager() { 20→ const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]) 21→ const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' as const }) 22→ const [filter, setFilter] = useState<'all' | 'active' | 'completed'>('all') 23→ 24→ useEffect(() => { 25→ const savedTasks = localStorage.getItem('tasks') 26→ if (savedTasks) { 27→ setTasks(JSON.parse(savedTasks).map((task: any) => ({ 28→ ...task, 29→ createdAt: new Date(task.createdAt), 30→ dueDate: task.dueDate ? new Date(task.dueDate) : undefined 31→ }))) 32→ } 33→ }, []) 34→ 35→ useEffect(() => { 36→ localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(tasks)) 37→ }, [tasks]) 38→ 39→ const addTask = () => { 40→ if (!newTask.title.trim()) return 41→ const task: Task = { 42→ id: generateId(), 43→ title: newTask.title, 44→ description: newTask.description, 45→ priority: newTask.priority, 46→ completed: false, 47→ createdAt: new Date() 48→ } 49→ setTasks(prev => [...prev, task]) 50→ setNewTask({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' }) 51→ } 52→ 53→ const toggleTask = (id: string) => { 54→ setTasks(prev => prev.map(task => 55→ task.id === id ? { ...task, completed: !task.completed } : task 56→ )) 57→ } 58→ 59→ const deleteTask = (id: string) => { 60→ setTasks(prev => prev.filter(task => task.id !== id)) 61→ } 62→ 63→ const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(task => { 64→ if (filter === 'active') return !task.completed 65→ if (filter === 'completed') return task.completed 66→ return true 67→ }) 68→ 69→ return ( 70→
71→ 72→ 73→ Add New Task 74→ 75→ 76→ setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, title: e.target.value }))} 80→ /> 81→ setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, description: e.target.value }))} 85→ /> 86→ 95→ 96→ 97→ 98→

     6→const inter = Inter({ subsets: ['latin'] })
     7→

     9→  title: 'Test Project',
    10→  description: 'Test project for components',
    11→}

1→
     2→import * as React from "react"
     3→import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     4→import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     5→import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6→const buttonVariants = cva(
     7→  "inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50",
     8→  {
     9→    variants: {
    10→      variant: {
    11→        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    12→        destructive:
    13→          "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90",
    14→        outline:
    15→          "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    16→        secondary:
    17→          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    18→        ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    19→        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    20→      },
    21→      size: {
    22→        default: "h-10 px-4 py-2",
    23→        sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3",
    24→        lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8",
    25→        icon: "h-10 w-10",
    26→      },
    27→    },
    28→    defaultVariants: {
    29→      variant: "default",
    30→      size: "default",
    31→    },
    32→  }
    33→)
    34→export interface ButtonProps
    35→  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    36→    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {
    37→  asChild?: boolean
    38→}
    39→const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
    40→  ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => {
    41→    const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    42→    return (
    43→      <Comp
    44→        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    45→        ref={ref}
    46→        {...props}
    47→      />
    48→    )
    49→  }
    50→)
    51→Button.displayName = "Button"
    52→export { Button, buttonVariants }
    53→
